long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Word City Crossed is a word puzzle game created by Unico Studio that is available as a Chrome extension. Players get to travel around the globe by combining letters into meaningful words. The objective is to assemble the given letters to create as many words as possible in order to pass the level and collect coins. Once all the puzzles in a city have been solved, players will unlock the next city to visit.

To enhance the gameplay, players can use their collected coins to purchase power-ups and hints that will help them along the way. With its global theme and focus on vocabulary building, Word City Crossed provides an engaging and educational experience for Chrome users. Players can access and play this free-to-play game directly through the Chrome extension, making it convenient to practice their language skills and explore the virtual world.

*Note: We have added "Classroom 6x, Poki Unblocked" button, making it easy for players to quickly access the games on our website https://classroom-6x.org, https://poki.ee
